title: Plat+ Team looking for Teammates!
body:
Hello!
we are looking for ambitious League players who want to put effort, time and their competetive spirit into this game!
We are looking for Players who were atleast high platnum last season! We are looking forward to play regularly during the week and participate in Tournaments at the weekends. We obviously require you to have a decent microphone and the time time thats necessary to make this work! (it would be appriceated if youre 18+) For Voice-communication we will be using Discord and ofc English is a requirement! 
If you are intrested in joining us just add  "xâyN" or "Pecueca" in league and ask about the team!
Roles we are looking for are all but ADC


About myself:
Im 20 years old and im from Germany
I hit Diamond 4 Last season playing ADC/support.
I am an ADC Main right now 
I played with a Team before and participated in several tournaments and weekly League competitions.

Im looking forwward to your messages have a nice day! :)
